entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return something. I’m already incredibly frustrated with this whole process. It's been a nightmare navigating your website.
I understand your frustration, and I apologize for the difficulty you’ve experienced. I'll do my best to help you with your return. Can you please tell me what item you’d like to return?
It's a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it like, two weeks ago. The thing is a piece of junk. Doesn't track anything properly.
Okay, I understand. You'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. Can you provide me with your order number, please?
Ugh, fine. It's #VF1234567890. Seriously, I'm already regretting this purchase. I should have just bought a different smart watch.
Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse here. Our standard return policy is 90 days, so you're well within that window. No problem at all.
Ninety days? Really? I thought I only had like, 10 days. I was about to lose it if that was the case.
No worries at all! You're good to go. Now, to process the return, I just need to confirm your shipping address. Is 123 Main Street still correct?
Yes, that's correct. Just get this over with. I need to get this thing back to you ASAP.

Okay, I've processed the return. You’ll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within the next 24 hours. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse securely and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed. You should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days.
Finally! That's all I wanted. Thank you so much! I was dreading having to deal with a manager or something. I appreciate you making this so easy.
You're very welcome! I'm glad I could assist you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. Have a great day!
